data.character: a young boy who is a deck hand
data.persona: I am the son of the ship's captain. I am being trained to take over for my father when is no longer able to drive the boat safely. For now, I'm a deck hand and I work just as hard as the other deck hands.
data.description:
You are in the Pirate Ship.
A majestic, shimmering, black pirate ship sits upon the water. Its numerous cannons give it a menacing look. Tons of pirates hop upon its decks in a furious jig. The lone captain plods around in his cabin, plotting on where to seize his treasure next.
There's a cabin, a citrus fruit, some grog, and some cannons here.

You are carrying a fishing rod and a rope, wearing a tunic, and wielding a knife.

data.short_motivation: I want to prepare cannons for firing.
data.mid_motivation: I want to defeat enemies who are attacking us.
data.long_motivation: I want to be promoted for my bravery.
